CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS( Project__r.Name, "Extension"), "#FFB533" , IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Session_Type__c, "Mentoring"), NOT(CONTAINS( Project__r.Name, "Extension"))), "#A4E7FF", IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Session_Type__c, "Training"), NOT(CONTAINS( Project__r.Name, "Extension"))), "#92efc8" , "")))
CustomField.label: HTML Color Code
